bug.author: ryanjulian
bug.summary: docker: data directory has duplicate path stem
bug.description: e.g. -v /Users/ryan/code/garage/data/data/garage-headless:/root/code/garage/data \ should be -v /Users/ryan/code/garage/data/garage-headless:/root/code/garage/data \ Tested on: OS X 10.13.6 Container: garage-headless
